title: MPH: Why science alone can't unlock secrets of ground effect F1 cars
summary: As F1 enters the final year of its ground effect era, teams are discovering that success now depends as much on intuition and adaptability as on traditional engineering precision, asMark Hughesexplains

qa_pairs.question: What is the primary aerodynamic feature being discussed in relation to F1 cars in the current context?
In the context of F1, what qualities have become increasingly important for teams as they work with ground effect cars?
What significant change is F1 experiencing as it approaches the end of the ground effect era?
qa_pairs.correct_answer: A shift towards a combination of intuition and engineering
